languages.text: "Ты серьезно считаешь, что смерть тех безумцев не была мученической? Стать живой заплаткой на корабле, захваченным демоном — можно ли изобрести казнь страшнее? Бр-р-р!"
"Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"
languages.original_text: "Ты серьезно считаешь, что смерть тех безумцев не была мученической? Стать живой заплаткой на корабле, захваченным демоном — можно ли изобрести казнь страшнее? Бр-р-р!"

traits.locale_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"
"Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"
"Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"
"Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

languages.text: “你真的认为那些疯子称不上烈士吗？在那艘被恶魔腐化的船上，变成活肉做成的补丁……还有谁能想出比这更可怕的死法？光是想想，就让我觉得反胃！”
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: “你真的认为那些疯子称不上烈士吗？在那艘被恶魔腐化的船上，变成活肉做成的补丁……还有谁能想出比这更可怕的死法？光是想想，就让我觉得反胃！”

languages.text: « Vous pensez vraiment que ces malheureux ne méritent pas d'être considérés comme des martyrs ? Peut-on imaginer mort plus horrible que de devenir une pièce de rechange vivante sur un vaisseau capturé par un démon ? Rien que d'y penser, ça me donne envie de vomir ! »
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez vraiment que ces malheureux ne méritent pas d'être considérés comme des martyrs ? Peut-on imaginer mort plus horrible que de devenir une pièce de rechange vivante sur un vaisseau capturé par un démon ? Rien que d'y penser, ça me donne envie de vomir ! »

languages.text: «¿De verdad crees que esa pobre gente enloquecida no cuenta como mártires? Convertirte en un trozo viviente de una nave capturada por un daemon... ¿se te ocurre una muerte peor? ¡Solo de pensarlo se me revuelven las tripas!».
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad crees que esa pobre gente enloquecida no cuenta como mártires? Convertirte en un trozo viviente de una nave capturada por un daemon... ¿se te ocurre una muerte peor? ¡Solo de pensarlo se me revuelven las tripas!».

languages.text: 「狂った者は殉教者に値しないと、本気で思うの？生きながらにして、ディーモンに捕われた船を塞いだというのに…これよりひどい死を考えられる者がある？不快な発想だわ！」
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: 「狂った者は殉教者に値しないと、本気で思うの？生きながらにして、ディーモンに捕われた船を塞いだというのに…これよりひどい死を考えられる者がある？不快な発想だわ！」

languages.text: "Glaubst Ihr ernsthaft, dass diese Wahnsinnigen nicht als Märtyrer zählen? Zu einem lebenden Patch auf einem Schiff zu werden, das von einem Dämonen erobert wurde ... kann man sich einen grauenhafteren Tod vorstellen? Allein bei dem Gedanken wird mir übel!"
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: "Glaubst Ihr ernsthaft, dass diese Wahnsinnigen nicht als Märtyrer zählen? Zu einem lebenden Patch auf einem Schiff zu werden, das von einem Dämonen erobert wurde ... kann man sich einen grauenhafteren Tod vorstellen? Allein bei dem Gedanken wird mir übel!"

languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

languages.text: "Bu delilerin cidden şehit sayılamayacağını mı düşünüyorsun? Bir iblisin eline geçmiş geminin hasarlı bölmelerinde yama olarak kullanılmak... Bundan daha korkunç bir ölüm olabilir mi? Düşüncesi bile midemi kaldırmaya yetti!"
languages.original_text: "Do you seriously think those madmen don't count as martyrs? Becoming a living patch on a ship captured by a daemon — could anyone devise a more horrible death? The thought turns my stomach!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu delilerin cidden şehit sayılamayacağını mı düşünüyorsun? Bir iblisin eline geçmiş geminin hasarlı bölmelerinde yama olarak kullanılmak... Bundan daha korkunç bir ölüm olabilir mi? Düşüncesi bile midemi kaldırmaya yetti!"
